detail_desc: Cap in woven fabric with a motif and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Scarf in a soft slub cotton weave with short fringes along the sides. Size 85x190 cm.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Shirt dress in slightly stretchy washed denim with pearly buttons. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Drawstring at the waist, a yoke at the back and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pull-on trousers in double-weave slub cotton with an elasticated decorative drawstring waist and patch front pockets.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and reflective details.
Captain's cap in a felted wool blend with metal buttons at the sides and braiding at the front. Quilted lining.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with an extended waistband, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Chiffon top with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric and lining is partly recycled.
Glittery set with two metal hair clips and two hair elastics without metal clips, all with bows in airy, glittery chiffon. Length of hair clips 5 cm.

Grained imitation leather card holder in the shape of a small handbag with a handle at the top and a flap with a press-stud. On the inside of the flap are the fastenings for the accompanying narrow metal chain shoulder strap with a trigger clasp. Four large inner compartments and three smaller compartments. Size 1.5x7x10 cm.
5-pocket jeans in denim with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Short twisted metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Lined bikini top with a mesh racer back and wide elastic hem.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, button placket and wrapover back with an opening at the bottom. Seam at the waist with gathers and elastication at the back, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist. Slightly looser fit with legs that taper gently to the hem. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, thin shoulder pads, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a short slit at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.

Boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pocket that fastens with a contrasting colour tab and D-rings.
Earrings in textured metal with an oval-shaped pendant in patterned plastic. Length 5.5 cm.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Espadrilles with a jute trim around the soles. Cotton twill and leather linings, jute insoles and rubber soles.

Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton. Shirt with rounded notch lapels, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck. Buttons down the front, long sleeves, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in sequined mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Jersey lining.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Imitation suede boots with a fold-down shaft and an opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Scarf in patterned silk. Size 70x70 cm.
Joggers in sturdy stretch cotton twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered sun hats in soft organic cotton jersey.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with short, flounced sleeves.
Top in organic cotton jersey with narrow elastication around the neckline and short raglan sleeves.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a hood and flatlock seams. No buttons.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub-cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Short chunky metal chain necklace with large, round pendants in embossed metal. Adjustable length 39.5-46 cm.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a lace-trimmed seam at the shoulders and an open section at the front with a tie at the neck. Short, elasticated puff sleeves with a small frill trim, a concealed zip in one side, a lace-trimmed seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Thin metal chain necklaces with round pendants. Adjustable length 43-51 cm and 50-58 cm.
Ballet pumps in soft leather with blunt toes. Leather insoles.
Microfibre underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Longer top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with a V-neck and decorative knot detail at the front.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, seam at the hips, flounced skirt and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Vest tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and a decorative bow at the front.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Cargo joggers in washed cotton canvas. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and bellows pockets with a flap on the legs. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.

Set with a top and trousers in patterned cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Jersey trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Playsuit in softly draping fabric with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and ties at the waist. Cut-out section at the back, a wide flounce over the shoulders that continues down the front, and flounces at the hems. Unlined.

Thong body in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and a push-up bra with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Opening and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Pleated jumpsuit in airy, glittery jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a loose added layer at the top, and straight, wide legs. Lined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Soft scuba aqua shoes with elastication at the top and a loop at the back. Scuba linings and insoles and textured rubber soles.
Short, wide dress in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and press-studs at the top. Dropped shoulders, short wide sleeves and large patch front pockets.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Patterned bikini top with wide elasticated straps, lined cups, wide shoulder straps and a fastening at the back.

Blouse in a patterned weave with a gathered V-neck at the front, and opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathered elastication and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder.
Long cardigan in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Draped stand-up collar and lapels, and no buttons.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Hat in paper straw containing glittery threads. Braided, imitation suede band with fabric appliqués. Width of brim approx. 9.5 cm.
Bucket hat in woven fabric. Width of brim approx. 6 cm.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined, triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Large necklace with plastic beads of various sizes covered in patterned satin. Diameter of beads 2-4 cm. Adjustable fastener, approx. 49-57 cm.
Blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with elastication around the top and short, flounced, raglan sleeves.
